code: import React from"react";import{Button,Col,NavLink}from"reactstrap";import useFetch from"../../hooks/useFetch";import BlogCard from"../../Shared/BlogCard";import"../../Shared/Blogcard.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FeaturedBlogsList=_ref=>{let{lg,sm,md}=_ref;const{data:featuredBlogs,loading}=useFetch("blogs/featured");if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"loader-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loader"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading-text",children:"Loading..."})]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[Array.isArray(featuredBlogs)&&featuredBlogs.map(blog=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{lg:lg,md:md,sm:sm,className:"mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BlogCard,{blog:blog})},blog._id)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"viall__btn",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/blogs",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"btn primary__btn",children:"View All Blogs"})})})]});};export default FeaturedBlogsList;
